document_data.name: High Tide
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Tide''' was the largest tavern in [[Skullport]] and was built atop a brewery.
document_data.Inhabitants: Only invited guests were allowed to enter the tavern and the exclusiveness made the business a favorite with Skullport's leaders. The establishment was owned by a [[kobold]] named [[Gnawlip]] who sold information he overheard while waiting on patrons.{{Cite dungeon/200/Backdrop: Skullport}}
